issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: The KitchenSink geolocation demo (ui/common/phone/geolocation.js) uses iOS-specific properties and methods that are now deprecated on Android. There is no corresponding Android-specific version, which there should be to show off the new Android properties and methods. See https://github.com/appcelerator-training/tcad-code/tree/master/Starting_code/AndroidGeo for sample code that could be used.
fields.summary: KitchenSink - geolocation example needs to implement Android-specific techniques
fields.environment: KitchenSink 2.1.1.GA pulled from the Developer Relations repo on 1 Oct 2012

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
